title: Fix massive log file growth in MCP server
description: Implement a solution to control the size of MCP server log files which are currently growing to 7-8GB. This includes adding log rotation, reducing verbosity, and implementing proper logging practices.

title: Implement log rotation mechanism
description: Add a log rotation mechanism to automatically rotate logs based on size and time, preventing any single log file from growing too large.

title: Fix excessive console.error usage in file-watcher.js
description: Replace direct console.error calls in file-watcher.js with proper structured logger usage to reduce log verbosity and improve log quality.

title: Implement log level filtering
description: Add proper log level filtering to reduce unnecessary verbose output, especially in production environments. This includes configuring the logger to respect LOG_LEVEL environment variable.

title: Add log message throttling
description: Implement throttling for repetitive log messages to prevent the same messages from being logged repeatedly in a short time period.

title: Fix process management issues causing high CPU usage
description: Identify and fix issues causing multiple node processes to consume high CPU resources, requiring manual termination. This includes proper process cleanup and preventing zombie processes.

title: Implement process monitoring and automatic recovery
description: Add monitoring to detect and automatically recover from process issues, including automatic restart of hung processes and cleanup of zombie processes.

title: Fix JSON Parsing Errors and High CPU Usage
description: Resolve JSON parsing errors and high CPU usage issues in the Windsurf Task Master MCP server by simplifying logging and stdout/stderr handling, and ensuring proper server startup and shutdown behavior.

title: Simplify Logger Implementation
description: Replace complex logging system with a minimal SimpleLogger that writes directly to stderr, removing complex formatting, context objects, and color formatting that could interfere with JSON output.

title: Simplify Stdout-Stderr Separation
description: Simplify the stdout-stderr separation logic to ensure clean JSON output on stdout and all logs on stderr, removing complex validation and caching that was causing JSON parsing errors.

title: Implement Proper Server Shutdown
description: Create a robust server.js file to handle stdin end detection and ensure proper shutdown when Windsurf disconnects, preventing hanging processes and high CPU usage.

title: Create Test Script for Verification
description: Develop a test script to verify that JSON parsing errors and CPU usage issues are resolved, simulating various message types and monitoring CPU usage during server operation and shutdown.
